kpi.name: sgsn_2137a
kpi.formula: decode(SIGN( decode( ((IUSM.period_duration*60)),0,NULL,((IUSM.IU_SUCC_PDP_CON_MOD + IUSM.IU_FAIL_PDP_CON_MOD - (PAUS.DIRECT_TUN_CHANGES_2T_TO_1T + ((IUMM1.IU_SUCC_IN_INTER_PAPU_RA_UPD + IUMM1.IU_SUCC_IN_INTER_SGSN_RA_UPD)*decode( (PAUS.PEAK_ATTACH_IU_USERS),0,NULL,(PAUS.PEAK_IU_PDP_CONT) / (PAUS.PEAK_ATTACH_IU_USERS))) + (IUMM2.IU_SUCC_INTER_PAPU_RE + IUMM2.IU_SUCC_INTER_SGSN_RE) + (IUMM2.IU_SUCC_INTRA_PAPU_RE*decode( (IURA.PEAK_RABS_CURRENTLY_IN_USE),0,NULL,(PAUS.DIRECT_TUN_PDP_CONT_PEAK) / (IURA.PEAK_RABS_CURRENTLY_IN_USE))) + ((IUMM2.IU_SUCC_INTRA_PAPU_2G3G_ISHO + IUMM2.IU_SUCC_INTER_PAPU_2G3G_ISHO)*decode( (PAUS.PEAK_ATTACH_IU_USERS),0,NULL,(PAUS.PEAK_IU_PDP_CONT) / (PAUS.PEAK_ATTACH_IU_USERS)))))) / ((IUSM.period_duration*60))) ),-1,0,decode( ((IUSM.period_duration*60)),0,NULL,((IUSM.IU_SUCC_PDP_CON_MOD + IUSM.IU_FAIL_PDP_CON_MOD - (PAUS.DIRECT_TUN_CHANGES_2T_TO_1T + ((IUMM1.IU_SUCC_IN_INTER_PAPU_RA_UPD + IUMM1.IU_SUCC_IN_INTER_SGSN_RA_UPD)*decode( (PAUS.PEAK_ATTACH_IU_USERS),0,NULL,(PAUS.PEAK_IU_PDP_CONT) / (PAUS.PEAK_ATTACH_IU_USERS))) + (IUMM2.IU_SUCC_INTER_PAPU_RE + IUMM2.IU_SUCC_INTER_SGSN_RE) + (IUMM2.IU_SUCC_INTRA_PAPU_RE*decode( (IURA.PEAK_RABS_CURRENTLY_IN_USE),0,NULL,(PAUS.DIRECT_TUN_PDP_CONT_PEAK) / (IURA.PEAK_RABS_CURRENTLY_IN_USE))) + ((IUMM2.IU_SUCC_INTRA_PAPU_2G3G_ISHO + IUMM2.IU_SUCC_INTER_PAPU_2G3G_ISHO)*decode( (PAUS.PEAK_ATTACH_IU_USERS),0,NULL,(PAUS.PEAK_IU_PDP_CONT) / (PAUS.PEAK_ATTACH_IU_USERS)))))) / ((IUSM.period_duration*60))) )

kpi_info.title: 3G PDP context modification requests per second
kpi_info.use: This KPI shows the average amount of 3G PDP context modification request procedures per second. This KPI can be used to measure the signaling transaction load/capacity.
kpi_info.formula:
sum( IU_SUCC_PDP_CON_MOD + IU_FAIL_PDP_CON_MOD â€“
( DIRECT_TUN_CHANGES_2T_TO_1T +
( (IU_SUCC_IN_INTER_PAPU_RA_UPD + IU_SUCC_IN_INTER_SGSN_RA_UPD)*
PEAK_IU_PDP_CONT / PEAK_ATTACH_IU_USERS ) +
( IU_SUCC_INTER_PAPU_RE + IU_SUCC_INTER_SGSN_RE ) +
( IU_SUCC_INTRA_PAPU_RE *
DIRECT_TUN_PDP_CONT_PEAK / PEAK_RABS_CURRENTLY_IN_USE ) +
( (IU_SUCC_INTRA_PAPU_2G3G_ISHO + IU_SUCC_INTER_PAPU_2G3G_ISHO)*
PEAK_IU_PDP_CONT / PEAK_ATTACH_IU_USERS ) ) )
------------------------------------------------------------------------
sum( PERIOD_DURATION * 60 )

kpi.kpi_alias: 3G PDP ctx mod req pr sec
